scripts.deploy: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.patch: git add . && gulp && npm version patch --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
scripts.minor: git add . && gulp && npm version minor --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
scripts.major: git add . && gulp && npm version major --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && npm run deploy
